body:
Add version 1.5.0, remove 1.4-rc1 (use 1.4.0) and 1.5-rc1 (use 1.5.0).

----------

I grep'd through packages.  The only other package that even mentions
libunwind 1.4 or 1.5 is my package (hpctoolkit).  So, removing the
release candidates should be safe.

Going forward, I plan to keep two moving branches: master and the most
recent stable branch, currently 1.5-stable, plus the point releases.
title: libunwind: add version 1.5.0
